title: A prognostication for euer, made by Erra Pater, a Iew, borne in Iury, Doctor in Astronomie and Phisicke very profitable for to keepe the body in health: and also Ptholomeus saith the same.
author: Erra Pater.
notes: Running title reads: The prognostication of Erra Pater.
Identified as STC 10521 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
